portfolio module¶

class portfolio.MarketOnClosePortfolio(symbol, bars, strategy, opt, initial_capital=100000.0)[source]¶

Bases: backtest.Portfolio

Inherits Portfolio to create a system that purchases 100 units of a particular symbol upon a long/short signal, assuming the market open price of a bar.

symbol - A stock symbol which forms the basis of the portfolio. bars - A DataFrame of bars for a symbol set. signals - A pandas DataFrame of signals (1, 0, -1) for each symbol. initial_capital - The amount in cash at the start of the portfolio.
